name: DischargeFromInpatientFacilityCPT
title: Discharge from Inpatient Facility CPT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Inpatient discharge codes.),(Data Element Scope: Inpatient discharge codes.  This value set can be used to inform Q046, ACO-12 (CARE-1)),(Inclusion Criteria: Inpatient discharge codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Admitting, observation, or inpatient stay codes.)

concept.display: Hospital discharge day management; 30 minutes or less
Hospital discharge day management; more than 30 minutes
Nursing facility discharge day management; 30 minutes or less
Nursing facility discharge day management; more than 30 minutes

contains.display: Hospital inpatient or observation discharge day management; 30 minutes or less on the date of the encounter
Hospital inpatient or observation discharge day management; more than 30 minutes on the date of the encounter
Nursing facility discharge management; 30 minutes or less total time on the date of the encounter
Nursing facility discharge management; more than 30 minutes total time on the date of the encounter
